title: (x) Serif headlines on Wired and Guardian websites - Georgia {Dav, Eric Doctor}
content:
Hi guys — can someone tell me the name of the serif used for headlines on

[http://www.wired.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907010259/http:/www.wired.com/ "http://www.wired.com/")

[http://www.guardian.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907010259/http:/www.guardian.co.uk/ "http://www.guardian.co.uk/")

 [‹ Country Time Lemonade logo bold serif face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907010259/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45544 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Marvin Berry and The Starlighters logo on bass drum - various alternatives {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907010259/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45540 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ult
